hero.question: Will the DHS shutdown end after March 31, 2026?
hero.prob_take: The 10-point jump to 53% signals growing confidence that Congress will avoid a shutdown beyond March 31, likely driven by recent budget deal chatter and traders fleeing the binary risk. At even money, the market is overweighting the base case of legislative competence when a lame-duck Congress in election season has a track record of brinkmanship that routinely extends these fights into Q2 or beyond.

daily_take.headline: DHS Shutdown Odds Jump 10 Points. The Market Smells a Deal.
daily_take.deck: DHS shutdown resolution jumped from 42.8% to 52.9% in 24 hours on fresh signals that Congress is actually negotiating. But 52.9% prices in near coin-flip odds for an agency that handles 240K employees and border security. Smart money checks: has a framework leaked, or is this just hope? If there's real movement, YES bettors have value here. If it's noise, fade the pop.

sidebar.headline: Swiss tax referendum crashed 20 points. Either the polling shifted hard or bettors saw internal numbers the market didn't.
sidebar.label: Swiss Taxation Vote: 62.1%
